thread.title_full: GREAT WEEKEND IN NEW YORK, CITY - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: D2581RRlisam
title: GREAT WEEKEND IN NEW YORK, CITY
text: Weekend was great, hotel was above and beyond what I thought it would be!!! Price is a little high but that seems to be the normal for New York. Enjoyed the stay we will be back!!! We were close to subway and walking distance to many nice places. Can't wait for our next trip.
